name: Cassandy Worthy
description: My friends consider me to be an affectionate, romantic, loving, independent, educated, attractive and caring Guy who likes to play tennis, golfing, and taking long walks to enjoy the outdoors. I like reading a good book for relaxation and also enjoy the company of others.I’m looking for someone to spend the rest of my life with joy and accomplishment. email me and let me know how to get back to you as am here on a three day trial dont think I will continue after now unless I find you.what more can I say, I’m a CATCH! ha! I have a great smile,am also sexy bodied, beautiful eyes and I can be pretty damn funny! I love to laugh. I tend to see the humor and beauty in everyday situation. Life can be quite amazing with the rightful Partner…
